name: Card of Sanctity (Duel Links Skill)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
During your End Phase, if you Normal Summoned "Slifer the Sky Dragon" this turn, activate this Skill. Both players draw until they have 6 cards in their hands.

(This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
